name: html-to-markdown-monorepo
description: HTML to Markdown converter - monorepo root

scripts.build: pnpm run build:node && pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @kreuzberg/html-to-markdown-node exec biome check --write --no-errors-on-unmatched . && pnpm --filter @kreuzberg/html-to-markdown-wasm exec biome check --write --no-errors-on-unmatched . && pnpm --filter @kreuzberg/html-to-markdown exec biome check --write --no-errors-on-unmatched .
